headline: Northrop Grumman Corporation (NOC): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Northrop Grumman Corporation (NOC) on Substack by Daan Rijnberk. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NOC. Northrop Grumman Corporation (NOC)’s share was trading at $490.72 as of March 21st. NOC’s trailing and forward P/E were 17.32 and 17.48 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Northrop Grumman (NOC) […]

headline: Boeing Secures a Contract to Build a Next-Generation Fighter Aircraft
summary: Boeing receives a contract to design, build and deliver its next-generation fighter aircraft under the NGAD program.

headline: Northrop Grumman: The Forgotten Winner Of Boeing's F-47
summary: Boeing's win of the US Air Force NGAD contract is significant. Read why the NGAD deal positions Northrup Grumman for the next big Air Force deal.
